Turn your passive participation into active resistance. Facebook likes and Twitter retweets can\â€™t create the change you want to see. Calling your Government on the phone can.

There's one simple and straightforward way to influence the Government that is supposed to represent you: Call them on the phone. 

Calling is the most effective way to influence your representative. 5 Calls gives you contacts and scripts so calling is quick and easy. We use your location to give you your local representatives so your calls are more impactful. 

Want to know more?

There\'s one simple and straightforward way to influence the Government that is supposed to represent you: Call them on the phone. \n\nCalling is the most effective way to influence your representative. 5 Calls gives you local contacts and scripts so calling is quick and easy.
The 5 Calls app is open-source and volunteer made. Find it at github.com/5calls/android.
Your impact is %1$d calls. (Detailed stats coming soon!)

Data is anonymous and helps us understand how the 5 Calls app is used and make improvements.
